briefTitle: Assessment of Fluticasone Propionate on Ocular Allergy Symptoms
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Group, Multi-Center Study to Assess the Efficacy of Once-Daily Fluticasone Propionate Aqueous Nasal Spray 200mcg for 14 Days on Ocular Symptoms Associated With Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis
summary: This study is designed to investigate the efficacy of fluticasone propionate (FP) on ocular symptoms associated with allergic rhinitis (AR).

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Change From Baseline in Reflective Total Ocular Symptom Score (rTOSS)
